DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the inter-rater and intra-rater reliability of the Global Eyelash Assessment (GEA) scale with photonumeric guide in Japanese subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Inter-rater and Intra-rater Reliability Study of the Global Eyelash Assessment Scale for Assessment of Overall Eyelash Prominence
DOC.criteria: Able and willing to remove all eye makeup and facial jewelry during study Permanent eyelid makeup or eyelash implants of any kind Eyelash tint or dye application within 2 months Eyelash extensions within 3 months
